an4.27:4.1: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, appāni ca sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
an4.27:4.3: Paṃsukūlaṃ, bhikkhave, cīvarānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ.
an4.27:4.4: Piṇḍiyālopo, bhikkhave, bhojanānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ.
an4.27:4.5: Rukkhamūlaṃ, bhikkhave, senāsanānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ.
an4.27:4.6: Pūtimuttaṃ, bhikkhave, bhesajjānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ.
an4.27:4.7: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri appāni ca sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
an4.27:4.8: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭho hoti sulabhena ca, idamassāhaṃ aññataraṃ sāmaññaṅganti vadāmīti.
